outputs.release_notes:
# Northwind Analytics v2.1.0
Released 2024-10-15

## New Features

- **Smart Alerts**: Get notified instantly when key metrics cross thresholds. Set custom alerts for MRR changes, churn spikes, or customer health scores.

- **Anomaly Detection**: Automatically identify unusual patterns in your data. Our ML-powered system highlights revenue anomalies, unexpected churn, and growth opportunities you might have missed.

- **Mobile App**: Access your dashboards on the go with our new iOS and Android apps. View real-time metrics, receive push notifications for alerts, and share insights with your team from anywhere.

## Improvements

- Enhanced dashboard loading speed by 40%
- Improved export functionality with custom date ranges
- Better error messages for data validation

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed issue where regional filters were not persisting across sessions
- Resolved calculation error in customer health scores for Enterprise segment
- Corrected timezone handling in automated reports

## Documentation

- Updated user guides for all new features
- Added video tutorials for alert configuration
- Expanded API reference with mobile endpoints

## Performance

- Reduced query response time by 35% for large datasets
- Optimized vector search for faster documentation retrieval
- Improved memory usage for dashboard rendering
